inclusion.criterion: Affiliation to the French social insurance system
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Idiopathic MVP defined by the presence of criteria 1) and 2) OR of criterion 3)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Echographic MVP > 2 mm on the left ventricular parasternal long-axis view
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Echographic myxomatous valve (thickness > 4 mm) or significant mitral regurgitation (> 2 + using color Doppler)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation

inclusion.criterion: History of mitral valve surgery for pure mitral regurgitation due to MVP (myxomatous or fibroelastic deficiency) with available detailed operative report.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Absence of MVP or absence of mitral valve dystrophy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of heart disease causing MVP (rheumatic, HCM…)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation. She remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
